00012 ForeverCounter::ForeverCounter():
00013   sampleCount_(0),
00014   startTime_(0.0),
00015   currentTotal_(0.0)

00017 }

00022 void ForeverCounter::addSample(double value)
00023 {
00024   boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock sl(dataMutex_);
00025 
00026   if (sampleCount_ == 0) {
00027     startTime_ = getCurrentTime();
00028   }
00029 
00030   currentTotal_ += value;
00031   ++sampleCount_;
00032 }
00033 
00037 long long ForeverCounter::getSampleCount()
00038 {
00039   boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock sl(dataMutex_);
00040 
00041   return sampleCount_;
00042 }

00049 double ForeverCounter::getSampleRate(double currentTime)
00050 {
00051   boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock sl(dataMutex_);
00052 
00053   double duration = getDuration(currentTime);
00054   if (duration > 0.0) {
00055     return ((double) sampleCount_) / duration;
00056   }
00057   else {
00058     return 0.0;
00059   }
00060 }
00061 
00065 double ForeverCounter::getValueSum() {
00066   boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock sl(dataMutex_);
00067 
00068   return currentTotal_;
00069 }
00070 
00075 double ForeverCounter::getValueAverage()
00076 {
00077   boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock sl(dataMutex_);
00078 
00079   if (sampleCount_ > 0) {
00080     return ((double) currentTotal_) / ((double) sampleCount_);
00081   }
00082   else {
00083     return 0.0;
00084   }
00085 }

00093 double ForeverCounter::getValueRate(double currentTime)
00094 {
00095   boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock sl(dataMutex_);
00096 
00097   double duration = getDuration(currentTime);
00098   if (duration > 0.0) {
00099     return ((double) currentTotal_) / duration;
00100   }
00101   else {
00102     return 0.0;
00103   }
00104 }
00105 
00111 double ForeverCounter::getDuration(double currentTime)
00112 {
00113   boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock sl(dataMutex_);
00114 
00115   if (sampleCount_ == 0) {
00116     return 0.0;
00117   }
00118   else {
00119     return (currentTime - startTime_);
00120   }
00121 }
